item.title: Interesting Stuff #1
item.description: Hewitt, Meijer and Szyperski: The Actor Model (everything you wanted to know…) A rare thing, a discussion between Carl Hewitt (the man who designed the actor model), Erik Meijer and Clemens Szyperski about the concepts behind the actor model. Way more valuable than the hordes of Akka tutorials. The wikipedia page about the Actor Model is also very knowledgeable on this subject. For further reading, the original paper can be found online: A Universal Modular Actor Formalism for Artificial Intelligence.
